"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

      <value>main</value>

        <general>

            <entry>02ac476b-e8c0-4f5f-b5ed-c87c1c1a4fce#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Dobd a települések mellé a nevüket!</string>
            <string language="en">Put their names next to the settlements!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Setzen Sie ihre Namen nahe bei den Regelungen!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mettez leurs noms à côté des règlements !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponha seus nomes ao lado dos estabelecimentos!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metta i loro nomi vicino agli stabilimenti!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε τα ονόματά τους δίπλα στις τακτοποιήσεις!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Ponga sus nombres al lado de los 
establecimientos!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Kárpát-medence a 2.században</string>
            <string language="en">The Carpathian Basin in the 2. century</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">térkép, települések</string>
            <string language="en">map, settlements</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Karpatenbassin im Jahrhundert 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bassin carpathien en siècle 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A bacia carpathian no século 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bacino carpatico nel secolo 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Καρπάθια λεκάνη στον αιώνα 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El lavabo cárpato en el siglo 2.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte, Regelungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte, règlements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapa, estabelecimentos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma, stabilimenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτης, τακτοποιήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencia, establecimientos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>

            <entity>begin:vcard

    </metadata>
